condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

mailing-address.narrative: Corniche Nord Immeuble Saadi Quartier Camayenne Conakry P. O. Box 222 - Conakry

description.narrative: The activities of Communication for Development (C4D) Ebola,which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: (intersectorial salaries, zonal offices, supply/log and IT, intersectorial Communication for Development (C4D) and external communication)

title.narrative: Guinea 2019 Annual Results Reporting (Major contributions and drivers of results)
2017 Guinea: Evaluation de la Composante Survie et Développement de l’enfant (CSD) du programme de coopération UNICEF-GUINEE 2013-2017
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace
Households reached with interpersonal communication on Ebola prevention
Hotspot communities reached by social mobilizers/rapid response teams within 24 hours of detection of Ebola cases in the past week

Proportion of population surveyed who rejected alternatives to traditional burials/funerals

Proportion of population surveyed who indicated discriminatory attitude towards Ebola survivors

sector.narrative: Technical assistance - Cross-sectoral communication for development
